verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*: Go forth \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* come \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* shew thee.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w I|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* thee \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w I|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1288"\w* \w will|strong="H0127"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H1288"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w them|strong="H1288"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w IN|strong="H3605"\w* THEE \w shall|strong="H0779"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kindred \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*:

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w seventy-five|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Haran|strong="H2771"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* substance \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w gathered|strong="H7408"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* gotten \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Haran|strong="H2771"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Chanaan. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*,

\w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sichem, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* noble vale: \w now|strong="H0227"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Chanaanite \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w at|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w time|strong="H0227"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w To|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* passing \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* thence \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H3220"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, having \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Hai \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*; \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w forward|strong="H1980"\w*, \w going|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* proceeding \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*; \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* sojourn \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* very \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou art \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thee, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w keep|strong="H7200"\w* thee.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H0859"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* used \w for|strong="H4616"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* thy \w sake|strong="H4616"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w told|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H0802"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Pharao.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* they \w used|strong="H1961"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w sake|strong="H5668"\w*. \w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H1241"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H1241"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w maid|strong="H8198"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* she asses, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* scourged Pharao \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* most grievous \w stripes|strong="H5061"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sarai|strong="H8297"\w*, \w Abram’s|strong="H0087"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* Pharao \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* didst thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*?

\w For|strong="H0802"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* cause didst thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* might \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*? \w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w go|strong="H2009"\w* thy way.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* Pharao \w gave|strong="H6680"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* Abram: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* led \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w*.
